seo.description: Discover movies that match your mood on your favorite platforms. Find your next favorite movie in just a few clicks with What to Watch!

auth.forgot-password: Easily recover access to your What to Watch account. Follow our secure process to reset your password.
auth.login: Log in to access tailored movie recommendations. Continue your cinematic journey now!
auth.signup: Create a free account and receive movie suggestions that match your taste. Join our community of movie lovers!
auth.update-password: Enhance the security of your What to Watch account. Update your password for a smoother recommendation experience.

detail.collection: Dive into the universe of a movie saga. Discover the movies in the collection and find your next favorite movie!
detail.movie: Discover detailed information about a movie: cast, trailer, synopsis, press and audience reviews. Find your next favorite movie!
detail.tv: Discover detailed information about a TV show: cast, trailer, synopsis, press and audience reviews. Find your next favorite show!

descriptions.profile: Refine your preferences, manage your history and favorites. Rate and comment for even more personalized movie recommendations.
descriptions.search: Find your next favorite movie in just a few clicks. Explore our catalog of movies and TV shows for personalized recommendations.
descriptions.trending: Discover the most popular movies and TV shows of the moment. Don't miss out on the latest cinematic trends!
descriptions.popular: Discover the most popular movies and series on {platform}. Find your next favorite among the most appreciated content!

seo.name: What to Watch ?

auth.login: Login - Access Your Personalized Movie Recommendations
auth.signup: Sign Up - Join the Movie Enthusiast Community

detail.collection: Saga - Discover Movies In The Collection
detail.tv: TV Show Details - Cast, Trailer, Synopsis

pages.search: Search - Find Your Next Favorite Movie
pages.trending: Trends - Popular Movies And TV Shows
pages.popular: Popular - Movies and series popular on {platform}
